event.title: the time of Saskatoon's incorporation in 1906

data.event: The Buena Vista neighbourhood was within the city limits at the time of Saskatoon's incorporation in 1906.

event.title: 1910 house lots in the area were being advertised

data.event: In 1910 house lots in the area were being advertised for $275.

event.title: 1913 map of registered subdivisions, the riverbank portion of the current neighbourhood was originally named

data.event: According to a 1913 map of registered subdivisions, the riverbank portion of the current neighbourhood was originally named the Monroe Addition.
The majority of residential construction was done before 1946, with a smaller amount up to 1960.

event.title: a few decades of very little construction, infill housing projects jumped

data.event: After a few decades of very little construction, infill housing projects jumped starting after 1996.
